description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
Gleb Sukhodolskiy
Timur Zinniatullin
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
frack113 (split)
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
name: Session Manager Autorun Keys Modification
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\[Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr].*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss]0[Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt][Ii][Aa][Ll][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd].*/ OR /.*\\[Kk][Nn][Oo][Ww][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Dd][Ll][Ll][Ss].*/)) AND (NOT winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/))
